TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit DragCompletedEventArgs extends System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs

Docs.summary: Provides information about the event that occurs when a user completes a drag operation with the mouse of a control.

MemberSignature.Value: public DragCompletedEventArgs (double horizontalChange, double verticalChange, bool canceled);
.method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(float64 horizontalChange, float64 verticalChange, bool canceled) cil managed

Docs.param: The horizontal change in position of the control, resulting from the drag operation.
The vertical change in position of the control, resulting from the drag operation.
A Boolean value that indicates whether the drag operation was canceled by a call to the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb.CancelDrag%2A> method.
Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
Gets whether the drag operation for a was canceled by a call to the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb.CancelDrag%2A> method.
Docs.value: if a drag operation was canceled; otherwise, .
Docs.returns: if a drag operation was canceled; otherwise, .

Docs.summary: Gets the horizontal change in position of the after the user drags the control with the mouse.
Docs.value: The horizontal difference between the point at which the user pressed the left mouse button and the point at which the user released the button during a drag operation of a control. There is no default value.
Docs.returns: The horizontal difference between the point at which the user pressed the left mouse button and the point at which the user released the button during a drag operation of a control. There is no default value.

MemberSignature.Value: protected override void InvokeEventHandler (Delegate genericHandler, object genericTarget);
.method familyhidebysig virtual instance void InvokeEventHandler(class System.Delegate genericHandler, object genericTarget) cil managed

Docs.summary: Converts a method that handles the event to the type.

remarks.format: ## Remarks This implementation casts the `genericHandler` as a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DragCompletedEventHandler>.

Docs.summary: Gets the vertical change in position of the after the user drags the control with the mouse.
Docs.value: The vertical difference between the point at which the user pressed the left mouse button and the point at which the user released the button during a drag operation of a control. There is no default value.
Docs.returns: The vertical difference between the point at which the user pressed the left mouse button and the point at which the user released the button during a drag operation of a control. There is no default value.
